page.title: 08CURRENT EVENTS IN MARSDEN
page.content:
{
Last year in 1984 the mill at the bottom of Fall Lane was burnt down. It crushed Marsden roller skating club.at the moment they are knocking down the mill on Carr's Road to make fifty houses. Tomorrow 29th June 1985 there will be a festival for the Community Association.It will be held in the Infant's school yard and in the car park next to it.the majorettes will be marching and you will be able to throw custard pies at them. Last week the majorettes had three events to go to finishing with an appearence at the bowling match in the park on Sunday. The cubs are going to Thurstone Hall on Sunday and the brownies are going to Scarborough. {Lee Haigh-June 1985
